alert.note: Alert for Northern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 5:29PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Oconto County through 615 PM CDT... At 529 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mountain, or 30 miles southeast of Crandon, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Mountain around 535 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Bear Paw Scout Camp. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
